EmailTemplate.subject: Oregon APCO/NENA - Visit the TriTech Booth
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Oregona APCO-NENA Conference September 13 - 15, 2011 l Bend, Oregon
We are excited that you will be attending the 2011 Oregon APCO-Conference on September 13 - 15 at the River House Convention Center in Bend, Oregon. We know that you will have a full agenda, but make sure to visit the TriTech Booth #for a demonstration of our Computer-Aided Dispatch and Mobile Data.
Enter to Win a Law/Fire/or EMS Monopoly Game at the TriTech Booth
LOOKING FORWARD TO A GREAT CONFERENCE!
Terry Fitch, Regional Sales Manager terry.fitch@tritech.com
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121
